CompanyDescription: Unless otherwise specified or the context otherwise indicates, all references to the words "Scientific Games," "we," "us," "our" and the "Company" refer to SGC and its consolidated subsidiaries. General SGC was incorporated in the state of Delaware on July 2, 1984. On September 18, 2017, SGC entered into an Agreement and Plan of Merger with SG Nevada Merger Company, a Nevada corporation and SGC's wholly owned subsidiary ("Newco"), providing for the merger of SGC with and into Newco with Newco surviving the merger (the "Surviving Corporation"), for the sole purpose of changing SGC's state of incorporation from Delaware to Nevada (the "reincorporation merger"). The reincorporation merger was approved by the affirmative vote of holders of a majority of outstanding shares of Class A common stock of SGC entitled to vote thereon at a special meeting of SGC's stockholders on November 27, 2017.
